summary: "The Flintstones" is an American animated TV show about a family living in the Stone Age. It follows Fred and Wilma Flintstone, their pet dinosaur Dino, and their neighbors, the Rubbles. The show first aired in 1960 and was the first animated series to have a prime-time slot. It's known for mixing modern life with ancient times. The creators, William Hanna and Joseph Barbera, made it like a family comedy, inspired by shows like "The Honeymooners." "The Flintstones" was very popular and successful, only beaten by "The Simpsons" in 1997.
title: The Flintstones
